info.name: Youssef Shehata
info.title: Sofware Engineer
summary: I like linux, vim, and tmux
I hate Microsoft, LinkedIn and LeetCode.
Big fan of system design and architectural problems.

projects.title: Clinic reservation system
projects.summary: A backend system for a real-time clinic reservation platform using WebSockets to enable instant updates between patients and clinic staff.

projects.title: EduToons
projects.summary: an innovative e-learning platform that transforms traditional teaching materials into engaging animated content using advanced AI technologies.

projects.title: Blogaton
projects.summary: dynamic and interactive blog website where users can share their blogs, follow other users, and engage with content through likes and comments. This project is focused on developing a robust backend to support these features.

projects.title: Rust HTTP Server
projects.summary: A high-performance HTTP server built from scratch in Rust

projects.title: ascii-art
projects.summary: cli tool written in rust that generates ascii art from images

projects.title: Rusty-Grep
projects.summary: writing the famous cli tool grep from scratch in rust

projects.title: Valorant Roulette
projects.summary: a platform to randomizes your team based on your map preferences in valorant.

projects.title: Rusty-Git
projects.summary: writing git from scratch in rust

projects.title: Wordle
projects.summary: Re-creating the popular word guessing game Wordle using React.

projects.title: Yapocalyps
projects.summary: Yapocalypse is a microblogging platform inspired by Twitter, where users can "yap" (tweet) and follow other users.

projects.title: Mem-Management
projects.summary: writing my own mem allocator and tiny garbage collector in c

projects.title: Json-Parser
projects.summary: a json parsing library for rust

projects.title: Fitness-App
projects.summary: Java mobile application for calculating bmi and exploring new workouts.
